"A.P.241/12/5": "What are you looking at, Alma?"
"Nwah?!"
"N-Nothing at all! Well, I think I'll go have myself a little stroll outside now."
"Ah, she's gone. ...I wonder what she was doing."
"Looking at the history of ARKS?"
"Reading up on world events?"
"Hmhmhmm, intriguing isn't it? You two are curious as well."
"Uwah?! Xi-Xiera?"
"Alma, the first generation Claris Claes. The legendary being from forty years ago. What could have caught her interest?"
"I happen to have access to all the search logs! Just say the word and the mystery is solved!"
"Xiera."
"...Don't go overboard."
"She shouldn't be spying at all in the first place! Please stop this, Xiao!"
"And Xiera, don't just start snooping immediately!"
"These are..."
"Regius and Maria's deployment records...?"
"Xiao. Can't we do something for her?"
"...There are things even I can't do. Making the Akashic Record visible or interactable just happens to be one of them."
"It's so sad that Alma has to put up with this, though."
"Even though she's still fighting for ARKS, giving it her all..."

"...So! We'll just have to figure something out!
That's okay, right Xiao?"

"It's not as if I've got anything against her.
You're free to try whatever you want."
"...However, don't make a big scene. Alma wouldn't want that."
